page.title: 20LEISURE
page.content: {Wrotham}: Wrotham hall is used for plays, music concerts, dog training, wedding receptions and discos. There is a working mens club in the Masonic Hall where people go to drink, play snooker, darts and have discos. At the secondary school there are evening classes which are open to any adult. {Borough Green}: At Borough Green Village Hall the Borograds perform plays like Cinderella and the Wizard of Oz. There is a ballet club for young children. At Borough Green School there is a dance club open to all pupils.
